original_text: When they arrived at the Fountain Gate they all went up the steps of the City of David. While they went up the steps, they passed King David's palace. Then they continued along the wall to the Water Gate, on the east side of the city. When they arrived at the Fountain Gate they all went up the steps of the City of David. While they went up the steps, they passed King David's palace. Then they continued along the wall to the Water Gate, on the east side of the city.
korean_text: 샘문으로 전진하여 성벽으로 올라가는 곳에 이르러 다윗 성의 층계로 올라가서 다윗의 궁 윗 길에서 동쪽으로 향하여 수문에 이르렀고

sentences.original_text: When they arrived at the Fountain Gate
they all went up the steps of the City of David
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 다윗 성의 계단을 올라갔다

sentences.original_text: While they went up the steps
Then they continued along the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 성벽을 따라 계속 나아갔다

sentences.original_text: on the east side of the city
